events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very inconvenient.
The reported issue involves a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product in the shipment.
Assigning to the refunds department to handle the customer's refund inquiry appropriately.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let me help you process your refund quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 548932 and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product clearly in the package.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and arrange a pickup for the incorrect item.
That sounds great, I appreciate your prompt response and will await the refund confirmation.
The refund has been processed successfully and a courier will collect the wrong item by tomorrow.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
Your case is now closed. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance. Thank you for your patience.
